title: Build Baitoo salon appointment booking app with dual user roles

requirements.text: Implement phone number-based authentication system for both salon owners and customers with signup and login flows

quotes: Sign up / Login with phone number

acceptanceCriteria: Users can sign up with phone number
Users can log in with phone number
System distinguishes between salon owner and customer roles
Authentication state persists across sessions

requirements.text: Create salon profile management interface for salon owners to input and edit shop name, address, contact number, and opening hours

quotes: Create salon profile (Shop Name, Address, Contact Number, Opening Hours)

acceptanceCriteria: Salon owners can create a new salon profile
Profile includes shop name, address, contact number, and opening hours fields
Salon owners can edit their profile after creation
Profile data is stored and retrieved correctly

requirements.text: Build service management system for salon owners to add, edit, and display services with names and prices in Indian Rupees (e.g., Haircut ₹150, Beard ₹80, Facial ₹500)
acceptanceCriteria: Salon owners can add new services with name and price
Services display prices in rupees format
Salon owners can edit existing services
Services are associated with the correct salon profile

requirements.text: Implement time slot management system for salon owners to set and configure available appointment time slots
acceptanceCriteria: Salon owners can define available time slots
Time slots can be configured per day
System prevents double-booking of time slots
Time slots reflect salon opening hours

requirements.text: Create bookings dashboard for salon owners to view all appointments with customer details, service, and time, with ability to mark bookings as completed
acceptanceCriteria: Salon owners see a list of all their bookings
Bookings display customer name, service, date, and time
Salon owners can mark individual bookings as completed
Completed bookings are visually distinguished from pending ones

requirements.text: Build customer-facing salon discovery page showing list of salons in Faizabad with basic information
acceptanceCriteria: Customers see a list of available salons
Each salon listing shows shop name and basic info
Listings are limited to Faizabad area
Customers can tap on a salon to view details

requirements.text: Create detailed salon view page displaying complete salon information including services with prices, opening hours, address, and contact number

quotes: View salon details and services with price

acceptanceCriteria: Salon details page shows all salon profile information
All services are listed with their prices in rupees
Opening hours and contact information are clearly displayed
Page layout is easy to read and navigate

requirements.text: Implement appointment booking flow for customers to select service, choose available time slot, and confirm booking
acceptanceCriteria: Customers can select a service from salon's offerings
System displays only available time slots
Customers can complete booking in a clear step-by-step flow
Booking is saved to database with customer and salon information

requirements.text: Create booking confirmation system that displays confirmation details to customer after successful appointment booking

quotes: Basic notification system for booking confirmation

acceptanceCriteria: Customers see confirmation message immediately after booking
Confirmation includes salon name, service, date, and time
Booking details are stored and retrievable
Confirmation is sent to both customer and salon owner

requirements.text: Build rating and review system allowing customers to submit ratings and written reviews after service completion

quotes: Add rating and review after service

acceptanceCriteria: Customers can only review completed bookings
Rating includes numeric score and optional written review
Reviews are associated with the correct salon
Reviews are displayed on salon detail pages

requirements.text: Create admin panel interface to view and manage all salons and users in the system

quotes: Admin panel to manage salons and users

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view list of all registered salons
Admin can view list of all users (both salon owners and customers)
Admin has ability to deactivate or remove salons or users if needed
Admin panel is protected with authentication

requirements.text: Design and implement a simple, clean, modern mobile-responsive interface with light theme, easy navigation optimized for small-town users with focus on usability

quotes: Focus on usability for small-town users

acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses light color scheme throughout
Navigation is intuitive and requires minimal clicks
UI works well on mobile devices
Design is clean without unnecessary complexity
Text and buttons are appropriately sized for easy interaction

constraints: Use phone number authentication only (no email)
Target deployment for 10-20 salons and 100-200 users
Keep MVP scope without advanced features
Display all prices in Indian Rupees (₹)
nonGoals: Real-time chat between customers and salon owners

required: Salon chair icon illustration for service listings in warm brown tones (salon-chair-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Appointment calendar icon in soft orange for booking interface (calendar-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Star rating icon in gold for review system (star-icon.dim_48x48.png)
Clean hero banner with abstract salon-themed patterns in muted earth tones (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
